titleStmt.title: Take heed in time: or, A briefe relation of many harmes which have of late been done by fire in Marlborough and in other places This copy was drawne up and printed, on purpose for the world to take notice of, and to be carefull to prevent the danger of fire. Written by L.P.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Grove, and are to be sold at his shop on Snow-hill,

notesStmt.note: Year of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
